title: Alcohol, tobacco and drugs versus physical fitness
creator_credit: George J. Holland and AIMS Instructional Media
brief_description: Stresses a positive approach to avoidance of drug abuse in young people by associating exercise and physical health with the ‘good life’. Young people are shown cycling, back-packing, skiing and surfing. The effects of stimulants and depressants on mental and physical performance are discussed.
